title: Donald Trump Facing Arrest As The Deep State Preps For The 2024 Presidential (s)Election…
cleaned_text:
This morning former US president Donald Trump suggested that he may be arrested on this coming Tuesday March the 21st. Manhattan prosecutors are investigating the $130k of hush money that was paid out to the adult film actor Stormy Daniels.

Trump then called on his supporters in a post on his truth social platform to “protest” and to “take our nation back”

Some commentators have interpreted this as a call to violence while others suggest that Trump will win by a land slide if the DA arrests him on Tuesday.

But is it simply a coincidence that Trump and Putin are both facing arrest at the same time?

And is it a coincidence that all this is happening in the midst of a potential global banking collapse that is designed to usher in global CBDC’s?

In this video Dan Dicks of Press For Truth reports on the news that Donald Trump is facing “arrest” while also explaining how the false left right paradigm is currently being played out right before our eyes!

If you’re old fashioned like we are and prefer to keep it old school, we also accept cash, cheques, equipment and words of encouragement! You can send us those things here:
